name: No Country for Orange Men

ingredients.item: Fresh blood orange juice with citric acid

preparation:
The combination of mezcal, blood orange and fine single malt is as surprising as it is delicious. This refreshing and complex original cocktail is perfect for almost any occasion.

Prepare a rocks glass with a chocolate, chipotle and sea salt powder rim.

Add all the ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake.

Fine-strain into the prepared glass.

Garnish with a dehydrated blood orange wheel.
